projects.name: Apoyafem
projects.detailed: Apoyafem is an app for helping women who suffers from household violence offering legal and psycological supporting

projects.name: Senecabot
projects.detailed: Senecabot was an autonomous robot which can follow an stablished route across an previously defined space. Can locate itself using QR codes. Can count pennies and give the total ammount of money pressent.

projects.name: SpringBoot Example Project
projects.detailed: A training project for improving my skills with SpringBoot & Hibernate. It was developed using TDD & BDD methodologies
